overview: Shiva(Manoj Nandan) is a normal middle class guy who dreams of becoming an actor. He tries hard but does not get any break. Seeing his pathetic situation, Shivaâ€™s friend Madan(Anil Kalyan) decides to rent out his ancestral property. To his good luck a movie unit comes forward to shoot their film in the estate.
title: Chitram Bhalare Vichitram
